item.title: LUNC Price Hints Last Pullback Opportunity Before a Leap Above $0.0001
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
After seven months of a steady downtrend, the LUNC price managed to breach the key resistance on July 13th that sellers used to pressurize buyers. This resistance was a downsloping trendline of the wedge pattern offering an early sign of trend reversal. Here are the potential targets the coin holders can expect under the influence

item.title: Ethereum Price Return to $1800? Fake Breakout Triggers Concerns of Minor Correction
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
Ethereum Price Analysis: On July 13, the Ethereum coin price breached a weekly resistance of $1966 as a signal of uptrend continuation. However, the coin price faced immediate supply pressure at $$2000 psychological resistance and plunged below 1966. This failed breakout suggests the recent rally was driven by market sentiment and not by the coin’s

item.title: Binance CEO Disclosing LUNC Holdings Renewed Terra Luna Classic Sentiment To $1
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance has successfully completed six years of operations. Binance CEO Changpeng “CZ” Zhao shared the crypto exchange’s key events and challenges in an official statement, in which he also disclosed that Binance invested $3 million in Terra (now Terra Luna Classic) and never moved or sold LUNC holdings. item.title: Shiba Inu News: Shibarium Testnet ‘PuppyNet’ Reaches New Milestones, SHIB & BONE Jumps
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Shiba Inu’s layer-2 Shibarium testnet “Puppynet” hit another milestone as the number of transactions on it now approaches 30 million. This indicates an increase in Shibarium network activity, hinting at its demand for the chain and a boost in SHIB and Shibarium’s gas token Bone ShibaSwap (SHIB) prices in the long term.
